name: css-unicode-bidi
description: Css module of single purpose classes for unicode bidi

scripts.start: tachyons src/css-unicode-bidi.css > css/css-unicode-bidi.css && tachyons src/css-unicode-bidi.css --minify > css/css-unicode-bidi.min.css && tachyons src/css-unicode-bidi.css --generate-docs --package=../../package.json > readme.md
